items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, soft dress that looks great and hugs your curves!
items.body: This dress is the perfect summer formal dress for just about any event. When I first opened the package, I was put off by the fabric being mesh. Upon first glance, it looked a bit like basketball shorts. But, once you put it on you cant really tell that the fabric is mesh. A great thing about this dress is the cut and fabric. The style is very flattering, and the stretchy mesh is very nice to smooth out your curves. I do not have any shapewear on in these photos, but I feel that maybe sizing down would have that smoothing effect. The bow detail on the shoulder adds just enough cutesiness without being over the top, and lots of the patterns are very wearable year round. I like the apricot pattern the best as I feel it is the most versatile. For the price of this dress, I think it has great value as I can see myself wearing it for many occasions. It seems easy to wash, and I don't feel that the colors would fade easily. I would be careful putting this in the wash with jeans or anything with metal components as the fabric seems like it may be easy to tear. Overall, this is a super cute year round formal dress for a great value! Read more
items.author: Dulfy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So fun and flattering! ðŸ˜
items.body: This dress turned out to be even better than I expected! ðŸ‘ðŸ‘âœ¨ I hesitated to get it because of the one-shoulder style. But it fits very well and the mesh fabric, which is fully lined, is soft and forgiving. I'm using a normal wireless bra and just undoing one of the shoulders and tucking it in. It looks great and still gives both breasts support. The cut of this dress is so fun and flattering! It hangs beautifully, hugging all the curves gently and flaring out at the bottom like a mermaid skirt. I got a size M and it fits me perfectly (for reference, I am 5'8" 127lbs 36C). It's SUPER comfortable and I like how the fabric is heavy enough to drape without clinging anywhere. This is one of several items I've gotten from Prettygarden and they are consistently high quality. I am very pleased with their fabrics and construction. This is a nice quality dress at a great price (currently $37). You'll feel so pretty in it! ðŸ˜ Highly recommended! ðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸ Read more
items.author: Momlady

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: I picked this up in hopes of seeing my wife in it at an upcoming formal dinner. This dress is made with two layers. The outer layer is like a mesh or lace. It has the flower pattern. Then, there is another layer underneath. The red is bright and vibrant. Overall, my wife and I were not impressed. We had to size up because it runs small. It is also a maxi dress and too long for my 5 foot girl. In the end, we decided on a different dress for the dinner. Read more
items.author: freak3dot

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress (Black & Red) looks stunning.
items.body: This is a beautiful dress and it fits my partner like a glove. It honestly looks like it was made specifically for her body. Sheâ€™s very curvy, and this dress shows off every curve in the best way without looking overdone. The one shoulder design and mesh detail give it a classy, elegant look while still being flattering. The material feels high quality and the fit is spot on. It hugs in all the right places and falls nicely without bunching or pulling. She felt confident wearing it, which says a lot. I genuinely did not expect to find a dress like this on Amazon. She is saving this dress for New Years Eve so that says a lot to me. For a formal event or wedding guest dress, this one really exceeded expectations. I will update the photos if (Iâ€™m allowed) after she wears it. Read more
items.author: str8upx

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant design that complements curves!
items.body: This dress is absolutely gorgeous. The colors are bright and vibrant, featuring beautiful shades of pink with subtle hints of burgundy that look lovely in person. The fit is very flattering. I typically wear a size 8â€“10, and this dress fit me well and comfortably. The material feels well made and durable, not thin or flimsy. The one shoulder design adds a polished touch, and the flared ruffle at the bottom gives the dress a graceful finish. It lays nicely on the body and complements curves without feeling restrictive. This dress is suitable for weddings, date nights, Easter, or other special occasions. Overall, it offers great quality and style for the price, and Iâ€™m very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Eric and Nikkie Bendross

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silky soft, very comfortable
items.body: SO SOFT, I absolutely love this dress. Very flattering as well. Read more
items.author: Ashlie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color
items.body: This dress is elegant yet comfortable. The one-shoulder style makes it stand out, and the fabric feels light and breathable perfect for summer events. I received several compliments wearing it, and it fits true to size. Read more
items.author: J&Love

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Summer One Shoulder Dress Pink
items.body: 10/10 highly recommend. Very flattering for all different body types, from skinny to curvy. The material is soft and durable through washes. The pink color is vibrant and eye catching. Iâ€™m planning to wear it for Motherâ€™s Day brunch, it would be suitable for many occasions. Read more
items.author: Nikki Z

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Sleeveless One Shoulder Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Sleeveless One Shoulder Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Orange Watercolour, Apricot Blue Flower, Black Red Flower, Floral Apricot, Pink Flower, Floral Blue Rose, Purple Flower, Polka Dot Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
